content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Furnace at Position(5.0, 5.0)
Consists of:
– A furnace located at Position(5.0, 5.0) used for converting iron ore (with coal) into iron plates.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at Position(–27.0, –60.0)
Consists of:
– A furnace located at Position(–27.0, –60.0) used for converting copper ore (with coal) into copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Incorrect API usage with get_entities  
  – Avoid using unexpected keyword arguments. In the first error, a ‘radius’ keyword was passed even though the API did not expect it.  
  – Similarly, ensure that the number and type of arguments (positional versus keyword) exactly match the function’s signature.

• Lab placement and crafting failures  
  – Before attempting to place a Lab, verify that a Lab exists in inventory to prevent placement errors.  
  – Use a fallback that converts potential None returns into empty iterables to avoid errors when iterating over lab entities.  
  – Confirm that all required sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available before initiating Lab crafting.

• Resource chain deficiencies  
  – Ensure that resource processing (via smelting and conversion in furnaces) produces sufficient intermediate products before attempting complex crafting, such as Lab production.
